refnamediv.refpurpose: print real and effective user and group IDs

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Print user and group information for the specified USER, or (when USER omitted) for the current user.

listitem.para: ignore, for compatibility with other versions
print only the security context of the current user
print only the effective group ID
print a name instead of a number, for -ugG
print the real ID instead of the effective ID, with -ugG
print only the effective user ID
delimit entries with NUL characters, not whitespace;
Without any OPTION, print some useful set of identified information.
GNU coreutils online help: <http://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/> Report id translation bugs to <http://translationproject.org/team/>

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: Written by Arnold Robbins and David MacKenzie.

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: The full documentation for id is maintained as a Texinfo manual. If the info and id programs are properly installed at your site, the command
should give you access to the complete manual.
